| HistoryText             = The 3Peace was created by the [[Han, Chang, Lin, Sun, and Ho Tao-Yu (Earth-616)|Collective Man]], [[Dei Guan (Earth-616)|Jade Dragon]] and [[Nuwa (Earth-616)|Nuwa]]. All three were concerned with the manner in which the government of [[China]] treated their super-human citizens; often imprisoning and exploiting them.{{r|X-Force Annual #3}}

The three hoped to be a peaceful group and sought allies from the [[Mutant Liberation Front (Earth-616)|Mutant Liberation Front]]. However, they were betrayed by the MLF leader, [[Reignfire (Earth-616)|Reignfire]], who saw more benefit to allying himself with the government of China than with a small rebel group.{{r|X-Force Annual #3}}

3Peace has most likely disbanded as the Collective Man has returned to working for the government.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 #157}}
